item.description:
Support Ron Paul with literature and signs at this town event.

From the Arlington Republican Town Committee:

We will have a booth set up at the
Arlington Town Day, in Arlington
Center, on Saturday, September 8,
10:00 AM - 3:00 PM

We are seeking Republican individuals
and organizations who would like to
participate by handing out pamphlets,
bumperstickers, etc. to promote candidates,
conservative organizations, collect
contributions for military charities and the
like. This is a great opportunity to have fun
with liberals, promote your cause, and
enjoy a great Town Day attended by thousands!

If you don't wish to participate, then just
stop by and visit us!

Some who will have representatives, or
will have printed materials there, will
include:

- African American Republican Leadership Council
- The American Conservative Union
- Americans for Prosperity Foundation
- Log Cabin Republicans
- Mass Resistance
- Baby Safe Haven
- Mass Alliance of College Republicans
- Mass Federation of Republican Women
- National Rifle Association
- Republican National Hispanic Assembly
- Rudy Giulliani
- Fred Thompson
- John McCain
- Mitt Romney
- Army, Navy, USAF, USMC, ROTC
- AND MORE!

All Republican candidates and Conservative,
Libertarian, and Republican organizations,
especially local ones, are welcome to join us!

Please email or call me soon at 781-777-2171

Donnarose Russian Agri
Chair, Arlington RTC
item.name: Arlington (Massachusetts) Town Day
